archimate:Device.name: High-Volume Multifunctional Printer (HWMP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Centralized printing stations, • High-volume printing, advanced scanning, detailed image reproduction, large document workflows.
Specifications:
• Print Speed: 55–70 ppm minimum, robust monthly duty cycle (300,000 pages/month (industrial-grade)) • Print Resolution: 1200x1200 dpi or higher (detailed clinical and diagnostic image quality) • Scanner Resolution: 1200x1200 dpi optical or higher (high-quality scanning of diagnostic reports) • Copier Performance: Rapid duplex copying (55+ ppm), automatic document feeder (ADF), advanced collating, stapling options • Fax Capabilities: High-capacity fax, secure digital fax storage and forwarding • Connectivity Options: Gigabit Ethernet, USB, secure wireless network printing • Paper Capacity: Minimum 2000-sheet multiple tray capacity, 150-sheet multipurpose tray • Input/Output Tray Size: All standard clinical forms, Letter/A4, Legal, Ledger-sized paper • Energy Efficiency: ENERGY STAR certification, power-saving standby modes • Operating System Support: Windows 11 Pro, Windows Server, seamless clinical system integration • Protective Equipment: Robust casing, secure user authentication panel, dust covers, secure document tray locks
